objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F3E5D4'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E6C9AB'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#D9A282'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C27F60'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#F9F2EA' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M0,240 C180,280 360,160 540,200 L540,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0,840 C180,800 360,920 540,880 L540,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='120' cy='540' r='80' fill='#D9A282' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='420' cy='240' r='60' fill='#D9A282' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='320' cy='840' r='70' fill='#D9A282' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='820' cy='340' r='100' fill='#D9A282' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='920' cy='740' r='80' fill='#D9A282' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Premium crystal with exceptional clarity
• Rose gold-toned for modern elegance
• Delicate curve for comfortable fit

product_details.name: Elegant Double-Row Crystal Tennis Bracelet - Timeless Sparkle
product_details.description:
• Stunning dual-row design for enhanced brilliance
• Premium crystal stones with exceptional clarity
• Delicate curved silhouette for comfortable fit
• Perfect balance of sophistication and glamour
• Ideal for special occasions and everyday luxury
• Secure prong setting for lasting durability
• Rose gold-toned finish for modern elegance
• Versatile accessory that complements any outfit
• Professional jewelry craftsmanship
• Makes an unforgettable gift for loved ones

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and luxurious design with a clean split layout. The left half has a soft gradient background incorporating wavy accent shapes and faint circular patterns, offering a warm, elegant feel. The right half uses a very light beige backdrop with low-opacity circular accents to highlight the bracelet image prominently. The heading layer (`heading`) is bold and uppercase in a deep rose-brown hue. Subheading (`subheading`) uses a classical serif style for a premium touch. The `description` text lists three selling points in a soft brown font. The `price` layer is impactful and clear. A dark maroon rectangular `cta_button` contains the white uppercase `cta` text “Shop Now.” The `product_image` displays a rose gold-toned double-row crystal bracelet.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream (#F9F2EA)
- Peach Beige Gradient (#F3E5D4 to #E6C9AB)
- Rose Gold Accents (#D9A282, #C27F60)
- Rich Brown Text (#8A4534)
- Deep Copper (#A86B4C)
- Soft Brown (#69352A)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features an elegant bracelet showcasing a refined and luxurious color palette. The dominant hues include a warm **rose gold (#B76E79)** for the metal band, complemented by sparkling **crystal white (#F5F5F5)** and **light champagne (#E5CBAF)** tones from the embedded stones. The image uses high contrast between the shimmering highlights and soft, blurred fade to the background, creating a sophisticated and dreamy effect. Colors blend seamlessly as the rose gold metal reflects light, enhancing the brilliance of the gems without overpowering them. This harmonious mixture makes it suitable for a banner using soft pastels and metallic tones for elegance.
